Contributor: Stevens, W. D. (William Dodge), 1870-, artist.; Forbes, printer.; United States Shipping Board Emergency Fleet Corporation, publisher.;
Note: Signed "W.D. Stevens." Date based on America's participation in the war. Initial "D" with a "P" in it appears on the bottom right of the illustration. Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: Text says that teamwork builds ships. Illustration shows three men working to build a ship.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Philadelphia, Pa. : United States Shipping Board Emergency Fleet Corporation,
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
